00016 typedef struct _statelem
00017         {
00018                 bool    enable;         
00019                 double  pitch;          
00020                 double  nbOcc;          
00021                 double  nbtot;          
00022                 double  ampacc;         
00023                 double  proba;          
00024                 void*   clock;          
00025                 void*   object;         
00026         } bc_statelem;

00032 typedef struct _bc_yinstats 
00033         {

00035                 long                    nbstats;

00037                 double                  minproba;

00074 int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00075 {       
00076         t_class *c;
00077         
00078         c = class_new("bc.yinstats", (method)bc_yinstats_new, (method)bc_yinstats_free, (long)sizeof(t_bc_yinstats), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00079         
00080         // credits
00081         post("bc.yinstats v1.0 – 2010: statistical post-processing for yin~");
00082         post("   design by Georges Bloch, external by Benjamin Lévy, moral & coffe support by Gérard Assayag");
00083         
00084         // assistance
00085     class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_yinstats_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0);
00086         // hot & cold inlets
00087         class_addmethod(c, (method)stdinletinfo, "inletinfo", A_CANT, 0);
00088         
00089         // input methods
00090         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_yinstats_pitch, "int", A_LONG, 0);
00091         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_yinstats_pitchf, "float", A_FLOAT, 0);
00092         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_yinstats_amp, "ft1", A_FLOAT, 0);
00093         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_yinstats_stop, "stop", 0);
00094                 
00095         CLASS_ATTR_LONG(c, "window", 0, t_bc_yinstats, window);
00096         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c, "window", 0, "Window (ms)");
00097         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c, "window", 0);
00098         CLASS_ATTR_MIN(c, "window", 0, 0);
00099         
00100         CLASS_ATTR_DOUBLE(c, "minproba", 0, t_bc_yinstats, minproba);
00101         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c, "minproba", 0, "Probability Threshold");
00102         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c, "minproba", 0);
00103         CLASS_ATTR_FILTER_CLIP(c, "minproba", 0., 1.);
00104         
00105         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00106         bc_yinstats_class = c;
00107         
00108         return 0;
00109 }

00116 void *bc_yinstats_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00117 {
00118         t_bc_yinstats *x = NULL;
00119         
00120         if (x = (t_bc_yinstats *)object_alloc(bc_yinstats_class))
00121         {
00122                 // inlets
00123                 floatin(x, 1); // amplitude
00124                 
00125                 // outlets
00126                 x->out_proba = floatout(x);
00127                 x->out_amp = floatout(x);
00128                 x->out_pitch = floatout(x);
00129                 
00130                 x->nbstats = 100;
00131                 x->minproba = 0.;
00132                 
00133                 // process arguments
00134                 switch (argc)
00135                 {
00136                         case 0:
00137                                 object_error((t_object *)x, "Number of stat agents needed");
00138                                 break;
00139                         default:
00140                                 if (argv->a_type == A_LONG)
00141                                         x->nbstats = atom_getlong(argv);
00142                                 else
00143                                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Number of stat agents needed as first argument");
00144                                 break;
00145                 }
00146                 
00147                 // process attributes
00148                 // override arguments if needed
00149                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);
00150                 
00152                 x->stats = (bc_statelem*)sysmem_newptr(x->nbstats * sizeof(bc_statelem));
00153                 long i;
00154                 for (i = 0; i< x->nbstats; i++)
00155                         bc_yinstats_reset(x, x->stats + i);             
00156                 x->laststat = 0;
00157         }
00158         return (x);
00159 }
00160 
00163 void bc_yinstats_free(t_bc_yinstats *x)
00164 {
00165         long i;
00166         for (i = 0; i< x->nbstats; i++)
00167         {
00169                 freeobject(x->stats[i].clock);
00170         }
00171         sysmem_freeptr(x->stats);
00172 }
00173 
00176 void bc_yinstats_assist(t_bc_yinstats *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00177 {
00178         switch (io)
00179         {
00180                 case 1: // inlets
00181                         switch (index)
00182                 {
00183                         case 0: // leftmost
00184                                 sprintf(s, "pitch");
00185                                 break;
00186                         case 1:
00187                                 sprintf(s, "amplitude");
00188                                 break;
00189                 }
00190                         break;
00191                 case 2: // outlets
00192                         switch (index)
00193                 {
00194                         case 0: // leftmost
00195                                 sprintf(s, "coocked pitch");
00196                                 break;
00197                         case 1: 
00198                                 sprintf(s, "average amplitude");
00199                                 break;
00200                         case 2:
00201                                 sprintf(s,"probability");
00202                                 break;
00203                 }
00204         }
00205 }

00214 {
00215         x->lastamp = ampin;

00220 void bc_yinstats_pitch(t_bc_yinstats *x, long pitchin)
00221 {
00222         x->lastpitch = (double)pitchin;
00223         bc_yinstats_addocc(x, x->lastpitch, x->lastamp);
00224         bc_yinstats_addstat(x, x->lastpitch, x->lastamp);
00225 }
00226 
00229 void bc_yinstats_pitchf(t_bc_yinstats *x, double pitchin)
00230 {
00231         x->lastpitch = pitchin;
00232         bc_yinstats_addocc(x, x->lastpitch, x->lastamp);
00233         bc_yinstats_addstat(x, x->lastpitch, x->lastamp);
00234 }
00235 
00238 void bc_yinstats_stop(t_bc_yinstats *x)
00239 {
00240         long i;
00241         for (i = 0; i< x->laststat; i++)
00242         {
00243                 x->stats[i].enable = FALSE;
00244                 clock_unset(x->stats[i].clock);
00245         }
00246         x->laststat = 0;
00248 }
00249

00253 
00254 
00257 bool bc_yinstats_addocc(t_bc_yinstats *x, double pitchin, double ampin)
00258 {
00259         long i;
00260         bool found = FALSE;
00261         for (i = 0; i<=(x->laststat); i++)
00262         {
00263                 if (x->stats[i].enable)
00264                 {
00265                         x->stats[i].nbtot++;
00266                         if (x->stats[i].pitch == pitchin)
00267                         {
00269                                 found = TRUE;
00270                                 x->stats[i].nbOcc++;
00271                                 x->stats[i].ampacc += ampin;
00272                         }
00273                 }
00274         }
00275         return found;   
00276 }
00277 
00280 long bc_yinstats_addstat(t_bc_yinstats *x, double pitchin, double ampin)
00281 {
00282         long i = 0;
00283         while (x->stats[i].enable && i<x->nbstats)
00284                 i++;
00285         if (i == x->nbstats)
00286         {
00287                 i = 0;
00288                 object_error((t_object *)x, "too many events");
00289         }
00290         x->stats[i].enable = TRUE;
00291         x->stats[i].pitch = pitchin;
00292         x->stats[i].ampacc = ampin;
00293         x->stats[i].nbOcc = 1;
00294         x->stats[i].nbtot = 1;
00296         clock_delay(x->stats[i].clock, x->window);
00297         if (i > (x->laststat))
00298                 x->laststat = i;
00299         return i;
00300 }
00301 
00304 void bc_yinstats_reset(t_bc_yinstats *x, bc_statelem *stat) 
00305 {
00307         stat->enable = FALSE;
00308         stat->pitch = 0;
00309         stat->ampacc = 0.;
00310         stat->nbOcc = 0;
00311         stat->nbtot = 0;
00312         stat->proba = 0.;
00313         stat->object = x;
00314         stat->clock = clock_new(stat , (method)bc_yinstats_out);
00315 }
00316 
00318 
00320 
00321 
00324 void bc_yinstats_out(bc_statelem *stat)
00325 {
00326         t_bc_yinstats * x = stat->object;
00327         stat->proba = stat->nbOcc / stat->nbtot;
00328         if (stat->proba >= x->minproba)
00329         {
00330                 outlet_float(x->out_proba, stat->proba);
00331                 outlet_float(x->out_amp, stat->ampacc / stat->nbOcc);
00332                 outlet_float(x->out_pitch, stat->pitch);
00333         }
00334         stat->enable = FALSE;
00335 }
